title: Skin
body: okay so, I went to go play a game of Elise jungle and use my blood moon skin that i purchased with my own money. Then it said it was locked and that i needed to buy it again, like, i paid for it with my own money, and now its not their, Riot please help

replies.body: Weeeiiiiird! I went ahead and looked over your account to see where Blood Moon Elise might have skittered off to, and it actually looks like someone refunded her. I thought that seemed a little suspicious since you hadn't done that yourself, so I investigated your login history and it seems like someone else may have been able to hack into your account. Hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can to make sure you account is resecured! Make sure to pick the option "I need help recovering my account".
I had the same problem. Snow day Singed is mine. makes me mad. they ever do anything?
